requests.name: Electric Scooter
requests.description: Client is a 67-year old elderly residing in a rental flat. She requires a new mobility scooter as the one she is currently using recently broke down despite her efforts to replace the battery and cables. She requires the scooter to carry out her daily chores due to her declining health, as well as to carry out her responsibilities as the main caregiver of her school-going grandson.

requests.name: Washing Machine
requests.description:
The family is living in a 2-room HDB rental flat. Client’s husband is the sole breadwinner and he works as a cleaner. However, he has not been earning a regular income due to his poor work attendance, health conditions and addiction issues. Client is medically certified unfit to work. They are mainly dependent on SSO financial assistance for family sustenance. 

The family will require a new/second-hand top load washer as their current washing machine recently stopped working; the washing machine has been in use for 10 years and cannot be repaired. 

The family received a donated second-hand washing machine on 11 May 2021 via Pass-It-On. However, the washing machine is not working too. There was leaking water when the machine is in use. Hence, client had to mop/dry the floor throughout the washing period.

requests.name: Washing Machine 7.5kg to 8kg (Top Load)
requests.description:
This is a family of 4 who lives in a rental flat and is experiencing financial hardship. 
Husband is the sole breadwinner as wife is currently nursing a newborn. 

(It would be good if donor can provide for transportation)
Their washing machine has broken down and they are presently unable to afford a new one. 
Looking for a kind donor to help this family.

requests.name: Bicycle
requests.description: Client is a single mother in her early-20s with 4 young children living in a rental flat. Client hopes to seek for a bicycle so that she can do grabfood delivery during this phase 2 heightened alert as her work is temporarily suspended until Covid-19 restrictions are laxed.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Simranjit Kaur

requests.name: washing machine
requests.description: Young parents with a toddler requires a washing machine as the current one is starting to malfunction. Family has one sole breadwinner as mother is on longer term MC due to intestinal conditions. A water-efficient washing machine is preferred.

requests.name: Laptop
requests.description: An expectant mother of 4 children requests for a laptop for her 2nd child. The family is currently managing with 1 laptop for the 4 children (Primary 2, Primary 1, K2, N2). They are currently strategizing to ensure that assignments are submitted on time. There is a sole income earner for the family and he is currently doing food delivery as his main job. The laptop will go a long way in assisting the family in reducing their financial and mental stressors.

offers.name: Instant food and drink thickener x 7
offers.description:
Instant food and drink thickener x 7
Expiring Oct and Nov 2021

RESOURCE® THICKENUP® Clear is the clear solution for dysphagia. Our exclusive patented xanthan gum formulation offers a clear solution for patients and clinicians.
✓ Instant Food and Drink Thickener.
✓ Transparent, tasteless, odourless and lump-free.
✓ Easy to mix and easy to measure.
✓ Rapid thickening and stabilisation.

Innovative Technology: Patented process and exclusive Xanthan-gum blend. Its proven amylase resistance ensures stable consistency during the entire swallowing process. Thickener helps in reducing swallowing problems by making liquids thicker. Thicker liquids travel more slowly down the throat and that makes them easier to control. 

Suitable for: Dysphagia

Mixing Directions:
1. Only use the dosage scoop included in the tin. For the best results, add the powder to a clean, dry cup, glass or beaker. 
2. Add liquid to the powder. 
3. Start stirring immediately, until the powder is completely dissolved. Leave to stand for one minute before serving. 

Ingredients: Maltodextrin (corn, potato), xanthan gum, potassium chloride. May contain traces of milk.
